creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: red and green dominate vertical panel; embroidery and applique, red on red, some green outlining; two small squares, floral motifs on top, one large center square on bottom; green edging all four sides; patched and pieced indigo lining; thick silk or rayon ribbons sewn in between designs and outer edging
title: Baby Carrier
